basics.name: John Chriskey
basics.label: Purchaser / Production Coordinator
basics.summary: Productive, quality oriented professional with comprehensive skills such as Expedite / AOG / Logistics, Customer Service, Finance / Accounting, Sales, Purchasing, Inventory Control, Stores/Warehouse, Management, Shipping, and Receiving among others.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for interfacing with leads, project managers, and customer representatives regarding aircraft documentation, parts status, and any problems that may affect the delivery schedule. Responsible for aircraft paperwork and work cards during the maintenance visits.
highlights: Ability to act independently to determine methods and procedures on new assignments
Ability to respond consistently with a high degree of initiative to resolve issues or complex problems that may arise
Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for quoting and purchasing materials for both Aircraft and Stock, but also included Stores / Warehouse, Shipping, and Receiving responsibilities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsibilities included finding price and availability on material needed and then order and track for prompt shipment. Dealing directly with the vendors and develop relationships for future business. Upon receiving the material, facilitating and expediting the flow of materials to and from various departments.

education.institution: State of Florida Department of Education

awards.title: Federal Aviation Certificate of Training
awards.awarder: Gold Award Administration Maintenance Technicians Awards Program

Vision Airlines Maintenance Indoctrination Course Training Certificate
